QuestData.Title: Exodus
QuestData.Description: We have no choice, $n. We must move further inland.$B$BI don't like it one bit, but we're vulnerable here.$B$BReturn to the stables below the manor. Let's get everybody on carriages and send them eastbound. I pray it's not too late.
QuestData.LogDescription: Board a carriage below Greymane Manor.
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks for stopping, $n. Our carriage got hit pretty bad.$B$BThe one in front of us got it worse.
